titleStmt.title: The crafty maid's garland, Containing four new songs.
The crafty maid's garland, Containing four new songs.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for M. Deacon at the Horse-shoe in [illegible], [1700]

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: blurred print with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

Trick for trick, or the squire's son well fitted -- The lady's answer that was trick'd of her intended husband the squire by Molly his servant -- The answer from Sally in our ally to Billy in Piccadilly -- The swains complaint for Dorinda.
